about_the_game:
It was merely a matter of time. [][][][][][][][] can only last a few years.
It was a deliberate choice, and yet here we are. Why?

With the [][][][][][][][][][]'s motivations a mystery, there may not be a correct choice. The overseers will bar your path. Should you fail, the world will not remember your attempt.

That alone is not enough to deter you, yet who knows what lurks in the Abyss. How far are you willing to go?

What you will encounter:

  • 100s of strange machines in a strange world, with questionable purpose.
  • A gateway of self-discovery, mystery, and p̵̨̈́ä̴̤͙͝i̴̢̼͊͠n̷̥̭̓̈f̵̩̻́̽ŭ̶̹͖͛l̴̮̆ ̷̺̼̉[̷͋͜ͅ]̶̧̃̔͜[̷̗̈́̓]̸̼͙̒͂[̵̨̍̀]̴͔͛[̵̛̗̹͌]̵̣̞̑͘[̴̞̟̑]̶̺͑[̴̭͍́͝]̶̨͆[̶̤͗͐]̸̠͓̄̔[̵̩͐̍]̶̳̘̄.̴̞̈́
  • 4 bunny-eared Overseers. They know who you are as much as you do.
  • Actually, some of them don't have bunny ears. But they're still bunny-girls.
  • Multiple paths to take, with Endings and Dead Ends alike.
  • 1 True Path to a bunny-girl's heart.
  • Various items and secrets to discover, as well as "adaptive gameplay and storytelling" elements, but bunny-girls are by far the most important part.
  • Yes. There are bunny-girls.

...
Why do you persist?


[Warning: the game contains blinking lights. Not recommended for those susceptible to seizures.]

content_descriptors.notes:
Some of the game's content may be found distressing or induce fear. Caution is advised.

Does NOT contain explicit graphic violence, gore, or similar mature content.

name: Nullschwert

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit systems only.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Toaster-friendly. Can run at 144fps.

short_description: A surreal Bullet Hell adventure through a forgetful realm of strange machinery and its bunny-eared overseers. If you persist, the purpose of your incursion may be uncovered. How far are you willing to go?
